title: Through the Looking Glass (Part 5)
description: The White Queen suddenly appears out of nowhere. The outdoor setting somehow transforms into a dark little curiosity shop, and the White Queen has become a sheep with an abundance of knitting needles. The shop transforms into a boat on a river for a brief time, and then Alice buys an egg as the shop appears to turn into trees in a forest.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge before and during reading
